item.title: Updates
item.description: Frequently asked questions will be addressed on this page during the tutorial. Do not hesitate to visit this page often during the tutorial! Accounts access Sandbox are available on May 29th 2022 for the duration of the tutorial. If you would like to run through the labs at a later stage on your own, with your company or institution, please contact us at isc22tutorial@amazon.com so we can follow-up with you.
